page.title: 17HEALTH IN DATCHWORTH
page.content: The{doctors}for this area are part of a group pratice which has its surgery in the nearby village of Knebworth.The nearest{general hospital}is the Lister hospital in Old Stevenage.According to a local G.P. this area is a relatively healthy one due to the fact that there is no heavy industrial plant within the locality and the fact that most people are employed in light manual or non-manual occupations.The only special health problems connected with this rural area are those associated with hay fever and its related allergies. Local doctors think that the greatest changes for the future will be :a) A further move towards preventative medicine. b) More health education and c) A sizeable population of old people.
